name: Pipedrive Tool
semantic_context: Create and edit data in Pipedrive
natural_language_description: 这是 Pipedrive Tool 节点。主要用于: Create and edit data in Pipedrive

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Create and edit data in Pipedrive
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Create and edit data in Pipedrive | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiToken
available_options: API Token (值: apiToken)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: deal
available_options: Activity (值: activity)
Deal (值: deal)
Deal Activity (值: dealActivity)
Deal Product (值: dealProduct)
File (值: file)
Lead (值: lead)
Note (值: note)
Organization (值: organization)
Person (值: person)
Product (值: product)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get data of many products
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

subject.name: subject
subject.description: The subject of the activity to create
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: The subject of the activity to create | (必填项)

done.name: done
done.description: Whether the activity is done or not
done.natural_language_description: 参数名: Done | 作用: Whether the activity is done or not | 默认值: 0
available_options: Not Done (值: 0)
Done (值: 1)

type.name: type
type.description: Type of the activity like "call", "meeting", etc
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Type of the activity like "call", "meeting", etc | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: done (值: None) - Whether the Activity is done or not. 0 = Not done, 1 = Done. If omitted returns both Done and Not done activities.
end_date (值: None) - Use the Activity due date where you wish to stop fetching Activities from. Insert due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
filterId (值: None) - The ID of the Filter to use (will narrow down results if used together with user_id parameter). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
start_date (值: None) - Use the Activity due date where you wish to begin fetching Activities from. Insert due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
type (值: None) - Type of the Activity. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

user_id (值: None) - The ID of the User whose Activities will be fetched. If omitted, the User associated with the API token will be used. If 0, Activities for all company Users will be fetched based on the permission sets. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

activityId.name: activityId
activityId.description: ID of the activity to update
activityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Activity ID | 作用: ID of the activity to update | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 作用: The fields to update | 默认值: {}
available_options: customProperties (值: None) - Adds a custom property to set also values which have not been predefined
email (值: None) - Email of the person
label (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
marketing_status (值: None) - Please be aware that it is only allowed once to change the marketing status from an old status to a new one
name (值: None) - The name of the person
org_id (值: None) - ID of the organization this deal will be associated with. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
phone (值: None) - Phone number of the person
owner_id (值: None) - ID of the User this person will be associated with. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
visible_to (值: None) - Visibility of the deal. If omitted, visibility will be set to the default visibility setting of this item type for the authorized user.

title.name: title
title.description: Name of the lead to create
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Name of the lead to create | (必填项)

associateWith.name: associateWith
associateWith.description: Type of entity to link to this lead
associateWith.natural_language_description: 参数名: Associate With | 作用: Type of entity to link to this lead | 默认值: organization | (必填项)
available_options: Organization (值: organization)
Person (值: person)

org_id.name: org_id
org_id.description: ID of the organization this deal will be associated with
org_id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization ID | 作用: ID of the organization this deal will be associated with | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

person_id.name: person_id
person_id.description: ID of the person to link to this lead
person_id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Person ID | 作用: ID of the person to link to this lead | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.description: The ID of the deal whose activity to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
dealId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the deal whose activity to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

productId.name: productId
productId.description: The ID of the product to add to a deal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
productId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Product Name or ID | 作用: The ID of the product to add to a deal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

item_price.name: item_price
item_price.description: Price at which to add or update this product in a deal
item_price.natural_language_description: 参数名: Item Price | 作用: Price at which to add or update this product in a deal | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: How many items of this product to add/update in a deal
quantity.natural_language_description: 参数名: Quantity | 作用: How many items of this product to add/update in a deal | 默认值: 1 | (必填项)

productAttachmentId.name: productAttachmentId
productAttachmentId.description: ID of the deal-product (the ID of the product attached to the deal). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
productAttachmentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Product Attachment Name or ID | 作用: ID of the deal-product (the ID of the product attached to the deal). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

term.name: term
term.description: The search term to look for. Minimum 2 characters (or 1 if using exact_match).
term.natural_language_description: 参数名: Term | 作用: The search term to look for. Minimum 2 characters (or 1 if using exact_match). | (必填项)

exactMatch.name: exactMatch
exactMatch.description: Whether only full exact matches against the given term are returned. It is not case sensitive.
exactMatch.natural_language_description: 参数名: Exact Match | 作用: Whether only full exact matches against the given term are returned. It is not case sensitive. | 默认值: False

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.description: ID of the file to update
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: File ID | 作用: ID of the file to update | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.description: ID of the organization to link to this lead
organization_id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization ID | 作用: ID of the organization to link to this lead | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

leadId.name: leadId
leadId.description: ID of the lead to update
leadId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lead ID | 作用: ID of the lead to update | (必填项)

content.name: content
content.description: The content of the note to create
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: The content of the note to create | (必填项)

noteId.name: noteId
noteId.description: ID of the note to update
noteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Note ID | 作用: ID of the note to update | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the person to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the person to create | (必填项)

organizationId.name: organizationId
organizationId.description: The ID of the organization to create
organizationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization ID | 作用: The ID of the organization to create | (必填项)

personId.name: personId
personId.description: ID of the person to update
personId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Person ID | 作用: ID of the person to update | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

resolveProperties.name: resolveProperties
resolveProperties.description: By default do custom properties get returned only as ID instead of their actual name. Also option fields contain only the ID instead of their actual value. If this option gets set they get automatically resolved.
resolveProperties.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Properties | 作用: By default do custom properties get returned only as ID instead of their actual name. Also option fields contain only the ID instead of their actual value. If this option gets set they get automatically resolved. | 默认值: False

encodeProperties.name: encodeProperties
encodeProperties.description: By default do custom properties have to be set as ID instead of their actual name. Also option fields have to be set as ID instead of their actual value. If this option gets set they get automatically encoded.
encodeProperties.natural_language_description: 参数名: Encode Properties | 作用: By default do custom properties have to be set as ID instead of their actual name. Also option fields have to be set as ID instead of their actual value. If this option gets set they get automatically encoded. | 默认值: False

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: filter_id (值: None) - Predefined filter to apply to the deals to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stage_id (值: None) - ID of the stage to filter deals by. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
status (值: None) - Status to filter deals by. Defaults to `all_not_deleted`
user_id (值: None) - ID of the user to filter deals by. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
